metadata.name: RAM-01 "GOLDEN SECONDS"
metadata.description:
"GOLDEN SECONDS" is the first piece for my collection RAM.

Pieces for this experimental collection took several months worth of work already, and it's time to start releasing them little by little. My collectors know me as an artist who does pixel art PFPs and semi-generative stuff, but pieces like this one are what I actually love to create. I'm filling these snapshots (or random scenic pieces) with my love for pixel art's golden age, raw emotions, and my personal feelings. I hope that my work, and this collection in particular, will change people's perception of pixel art in the NFT space.

I spend plenty of time creating these pieces, and it'll be a great support for me and my other projects if you will pick up my piece. I hope that you'll enjoy them too as a collector, and as a connoisseur of the pixel art â™¡

With gratitude and love, yours truly SHOWADOT 
https://twitter.com/showadot
